message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the generation of 3D human body models, which falls under the category of computer graphics (cs.GR). The authors use 3D scans of people and train a generative model using Mesh-VAE-GAN, which involves deep learning techniques such as convolutional neural networks (cs.CV) and generative adversarial networks (cs.LG). The model is also conditioned on different clothing types, which involves classification and decision-making (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with the extension of the SMPL model to add clothing, which involves mesh processing and manipulation (cs.MM).
